name: FlatOut 2
description: Sets up the DVD version of the game with wine
notes: The setup of the game automatically creates the file "FlatOut 2.lnk" on your Desktop. It is not needed and can be safely deleted.

task.description: Running setup of the game. Just proceed and keep all settings at their defaults
task.name: wineexec

content:
game:
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Empire Interactive/FlatOut2/FlatOut2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: FlatOut2.msi
- task:
    app: d3dx9_30
    description: Installing DirectX 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Running setup of the game. Just proceed and keep all settings at
      their defaults
    executable: $DISC/setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
